00042     
00043     BaseSensorData * LaserParser::parse(
00044         const std::string& data,
00045         std::string * error) 
00046     {
00047         LaserData * ld = new LaserData();
00048         
00049         StringVector sv = tokenize(data);
00050         
00051         int nrays;
00052         if(!RDK2::TextUtils::parse<int>(sv[1], nrays)) {
00053             if(error) *error = string("Could not parse number of rays: ")+sv[1];
00054             delete ld;
00055             return 0;
00056         }
00057         
00058         if(nrays<=0) {
00059             if(error) *error = string("Warning, no rays?: l = ")+data;
00060             delete ld;
00061             return 0;
00062         }
00063         
00064         int expected = 2+nrays+9;
00065         if( (int)sv.size() < expected) {
00066             if(error) *error = string("I expected ") + toString(expected) 
00067                 + " tokens instead of " + toString(sv.size());
00068             delete ld;
00069             return 0;
00070         }
00071         
00072         for(int a=0;a<nrays;a++) {
00073             double theta, rho, intensity;
00074             theta = -M_PI/2 + a * M_PI / nrays;
00075             intensity = 0;
00076             string t = sv[2+a];
00077             if(!RDK2::TextUtils::parse<double>(t, rho)) {
00078                 if(error) *error = string("Could not parse ray #")+toString(a)+": "+t;
00079                 delete ld;
00080                 return 0;
00081             }
00082             LaserData::LaserPoint p;
00083             p.theta =theta;
00084             p.reading = rho;
00085             p.intensity= intensity;
00086             ld->points.push_back(p);
00087         }
00088     
00089         ld->tag = getTag();
00090         // FIXME: parametri
00091         ld->laserPose  = Point3od(0,0,0,0,0,0);
00092         ld->minReading = 0.1;
00093         ld->maxReading = 49;
00094         ld->minTheta = -M_PI/2;
00095         ld->maxTheta =  M_PI/2;
00096     
00097         if (
00098            !parsePoint(sv[2+nrays+0], sv[2+nrays+1], sv[2+nrays+2], ld->estimatedPose, error)
00099         || !parsePoint(sv[2+nrays+3], sv[2+nrays+4], sv[2+nrays+5], ld->odometryPose, error) ) {
00100             delete ld;
00101             return 0;
00102         }
00103         
00104         //double d;
00105         if(!RDK2::TextUtils::parse(sv[2+nrays+6], ld->ipc_timestamp)) {
00106             if(error) *error = string("Could not parse ipc_timestamp:")+sv[2+nrays+6];
00107             delete ld;
00108             return 0;
00109         }
00110         
00111         ld->ipc_hostname = sv[2+nrays+7];
00112         
00113         if(!RDK2::TextUtils::parse(sv[2+nrays+8], ld->timestamp)) {
00114             if(error) *error = string("Could not parse ipc_timestamp:")+sv[2+nrays+8];
00115             delete ld;
00116             return 0;
00117         }
00118         
00119         return ld;
00120     }
00121 
00122     bool LaserParser::write(
00123         const BaseSensorData * input,
00124         std::string& data,
00125         std::string* error) {
00126         
00127         const LaserData * ld = dynamic_cast<const LaserData*>(input);
00128         if(!ld) {
00129             if(error) *error = string("Could not convert to LaserData data tagged as ")+
00130                 input->tag;
00131             return false;
00132         }
00133         
00134         ostringstream os;
00135         
00136         os << ld->tag <<  " ";
00137         
00138         os << ld->points.size();    
00139         
00140         for(int a=0;a<(int)ld->points.size();a++) {
00141             os << " " << ld->points[a].reading;
00142         }
00143         
00144         os 
00145         << " " << ld->estimatedPose.x   << " " << ld->estimatedPose.y   << " " << ld->estimatedPose.theta 
00146         << " " << ld->odometryPose.x << " " << ld->odometryPose.y << " " << ld
00147         ->odometryPose.theta;
00148         
00149         os.precision(20);
00150         
00151         os
00152         << " " << ld->ipc_timestamp.getSeconds()
00153         << " " << ld->ipc_hostname
00154         << " " << ld->timestamp.getSeconds();
00155         
00156         data = os.str();
00157         return true;
00158     }
00159         
00160         
00161 }} // end namespace
